ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Humourous note:  Verant defies laws of physics - again!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I understood that the pool just inside the zone was a spring, and that water flowed from it both to the sea and to the lake. Does the water in the creek to
ygData.messageBody:
>Anyway - it started out as an argument about why the water flowed from the
>ocean into the lake, instead of backwards - until we remembered that
>there's some NPC that says the lake is salty...


I understood that the pool just inside the zone was a spring, and that water
flowed from it both to the sea and to the lake. Does the water in the creek
to the sea really flow up?

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 30, Soi Disant Gentry, Povar
